item.title: Welcome to Blinktrade!
item.description: An open source bitcoin exchange. Start your own bitcoin exchange today.

item.title: How do I open my own Bitcoin Exchange?
item.description: You just need to go to blinktrade and click on “Apply to be a partner” section and fill out the form.

item.title: What is the relationship between the exchange and Blinktrade?
item.description:
Blinktrade is the technology provider.

The exchange operator hire the service of blinktrade.

Blinktrade only provides IT services for the exchange operator.

The exchange operator is de facto the company operating the exchange. By operating we means: Accepting deposits, Processing withdrawals, verifiying customers identities and allowing customers to trade safely.

item.title: Does the exchange buy/sell bitcoin directly?
item.description:
No. We are providing a service. Think on the exchange like eBay, we are just providing a service where you can find buyers or sellers.

All we do is provide a safe and simple environment to trade with other users, that is all.

We guarantee that buyers get their bitcoins and sellers get their money at agreed price.

item.title: How does a bitcoin exchange works?
item.description: SurBitcoin allow buyers deposit Venezuelans Bolivares and sellers deposit Bitcoins. SurBitcoin then allows buyers transact with sellers.

item.title: What is a Bitcoin Exchange?
item.description: It is just a marketplace, where people interested in buying bitcoins find sellers interested in selling their bitcoins and vice-versa.

item.title: What is Bitcoin?
item.description: Bitcoin is a open source P2P digital network created in 2009 by pseudonymous author Satoshi Nakamoto. The protocol allows the user to send, store and receive value at a significant low cost and in a short matter of time. Bitcoin avoids the need for central authorities and issuers.
